frontmatter.title: Withstanding Pressure: Lesson of a Recovering People Pleaser
frontmatter.description: As a recovering people pleaser 2024 is the start of my villain era. Here are some mantras and techniques I vow to start and continue using in order to enable myself to withstand pressure and set boundaries.
